Question.Subject: How to combine a translation of a book in Librarything?
Question.Content: I try to combine the turkish version of the books with the original-ones, but cannot figure how. Any ideas? amada: yes I am trying to combine the translation of a book to its original language. I figured out how to do it vi author's page, but isn't there an easier way?
Question.ChosenAnswer: Which book? What are you trying to combine? Are you trying to match the translation? If you explain your problem, maybe we can help.

Answer.Content: Which book? What are you trying to combine? Are you trying to match the translation? If you explain your problem, maybe we can help.
